name: Burley Bee Bike Trailer - Single - Infants to Children
description: Like a great deal on a flight, scale back on some optional extras and arrive at your destination with some coin in your pocket. The Bee Trailer has a with fully adjustable 5-point harnesses to keep a little passanger secure. Reflective details, UPF rated windows, and a heat-treated aluminum frame, keep your passengers safe on your way from A-to-B. The easy folding design and wheels that come off with the push of a button, makes the Bee easy to fit into your day-to-day.Full internal aluminum roll cage for protection in an accident.UPF 50+ rated tinted windows block more than 98% of harmful UV.Water- and wind-resistant cover helps little ones stay safe from the elements.Flex connector lets you lie the bike down, while the trailer remains upright.Hammock style seat provides passive suspension for rider comfort.Reflective materials and reflectors for visibility (front, rear and wheels)Push button, quick-release removable wheels.Folds for storage and transport, folded dimensions: 81.9 x 66 x 28.6cm.Includes: trailer, user’s manual, tow bar with hitch, 2 wheels, 2 wheel guards, and safety flag.
